EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining our webinar on care coordination
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Unlocking the Potential of Care Coordination
Image Female Doctor using computer
We hope you enjoyed our recent webinar. We also thought you might find value in a white paper that discusses the need to cut through the fragmentation for more connected care. Feel free to let us know if you have any additional questions about our virtual care solutions.
Read the white paper <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/white-paper/as-patient-care-channels-become-more-fragmented-communications/?utm_source=HMA&utm_medium=webinar&utm_content=HHS&utm_campaign=202205-HHS-ENT-OTH-MSFT]]>
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
